snippet.title: Phoenix Tales trailer
snippet.description: The launch trailer for Phoenix Tales -- the first game from Adventurers Guild Entertainment.  Phoenix Tales is a classic style point-and-click adventure game for PC incorporating RPG elements and puzzle solving in a uniquely stylized world.  Check it out today!  www.phoenixtalesgame.com
